edu.tamu.cse.lenss.edgeKeeper.client

Class EKClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.tamu.cse.lenss.edgeKeeper.client.EKClient

  • public class EKClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the interface to communicate with EdgeKeeper application running on the host machine. Any application can use the following functions to run commands for GNS Service.
    Author:
    sbhunia

    • Constructor Detail

      • EKClient

        public EKClient()

    • Method Detail

      • getOwnGuid

        public static java.lang.String getOwnGuid()
        Retrieve the GUID used by the host machine. This GUID is derived from the public key of the certificate used for registration.
        Returns:
        The GUID string

      • getOwnAccountName

        public static java.lang.String getOwnAccountName()
        Retrieve the account name of the host machine which is used by GNS. This name is derived from the alias of the p12 certificate used in the registration.
        Returns:
        Account Name string

      • getOLSRInfo

        public static org.json.JSONObject getOLSRInfo()
        Fetches the OLSR JSON Info from EdgeKeeper. EdgeKeeper obtains the JSONInfo from OLSR and converts the IP addresses with the corresponding GUID.
        Returns:
        OLSR Json Info modified with GUIDs.

      • addService

        public static boolean addService(java.lang.String ownService,
                                 java.lang.String ownDuty)
        This function registers a service and the duty at the GNS server for service discovery.
        Parameters:
        ownService - What is the name of the service, usually the application name
        ownDuty - What duty it is playing
        Returns:
        true if the update is successful at the GNS server

      • removeService

        public static boolean removeService(java.lang.String targetService)
        This function remove the service from GNS server, thus removing the application from service discovery.
        Parameters:
        targetService -
        Returns:
        true if the update is successful at the GNS server

      • getPeerGUIDs

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPeerGUIDs(java.lang.String targetService,
                                                            java.lang.String targetDuty)
        This function retrieves a list of GUID of the nodes running a targetService with the target duty.
        Parameters:
        targetService -
        targetDuty -
        Returns:
        the list of IPs or [] if no record is found in GNS server.

      • getPeerIPs

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPeerIPs(java.lang.String targetService,
                                                          java.lang.String targetDuty)
        This function get the IP address of the nodes running a targetService with the target duty.
        Parameters:
        targetService -
        targetDuty -
        Returns:
        the list of IPs or [] if no record is found in GNS server.

      • getPeerNames

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPeerNames(java.lang.String targetService,
                                                            java.lang.String targetDuty)
        This function get the host-names of the nodes running a targetService with the target duty.
        Parameters:
        targetService -
        targetDuty -
        Returns:
        the list of host-names or [] if no record is found in GNS server.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getAccountNamebyIP

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAccountNamebyIP(java.lang.String targetIp)
        Retrieve the list of account names which has this IP. It may return multiple hostnames if multiple nodes updated their GUID record with the targetIP
        Parameters:
        targetIp -
        Returns:
        AccountName

      • getGUIDbyIP

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getGUIDbyIP(java.lang.String ip)
        Fetch the GUID corresponding to the provided IP address.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        GUID string

      • getZooKeeperConnectionString

        public static java.lang.String getZooKeeperConnectionString()
        Obtain the local Zookeeper connection String. The Zookeeper server is running at the local EK masters.
        Returns:
        String representing the Zookeeper server addresses and ports.
